backend/main.mo: Main canister logic handling user profiles, rooms, chat, and authorization with access control and room/message storage.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old room data by removing the streamUrl field and producing a new rooms map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files across the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark design tokens and global layout variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file loading the app root and ZEGO UIKit Prebuilt script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React app configuring TanStack Router routes and theme provider.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with loading states and session clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog for creating a user profile with display name and optional avatar.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Authentication guard component showing a login prompt if the user is not authenticated.
frontend/src/components/common/QueryStat: Reusable UI components for loading, error, and empty data states.
frontend/src/components/follow/FollowBut: Renders a follow/unfollow button, calling follow/unfollow hooks and showing toast notifications. Hides itself when not authenticated or when targeting self.
Main application layout with header, navigation, footer, and conditional profile setup dialog. Shows login state and routes content via Outlet.
frontend/src/components/room/AudioClipsP: Displays audio clips for a room and allows the mic holder to record and upload new clips. Handles audio recording via MediaRecorder and playback via ClipItem.
frontend/src/components/room/ChatPanel.t: Shows chat messages for a room and lets authenticated users send new messages. Includes basic validation and a scrollable message list.
Displays gift catalog, user balance, and allows sending gifts to the room owner. Supports balance top‑ups and gift selection with toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/room/MicQueuePan: Shows current mic holder and request queue, allowing users to request the mic and room owners to approve requests. Renders queue items with accept controls for owners.
frontend/src/components/room/RecentGifts: Lists recent gift transactions sent to the room owner, showing sender, recipient, and gift name. Pulls catalog data to resolve gift names.
frontend/src/components/room/ZegoGroupCa: Empty or placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/room/ZegoLiveStr: Initializes and manages a Zego live stream instance, handling token loading, SDK availability, role setup, room join, and cleanup with error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, reinitializing on identity change and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useChat.ts: Provides hooks to fetch chat messages with polling and send messages, invalidating message queries on send.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches and caches the caller’s user profile and provides a mutation to save updates, refreshing profile queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useFollow.ts: Handles follower counts, follow state, and follow/unfollow mutations with query invalidation for related data.
frontend/src/hooks/useGifts.ts: Supplies gift catalog, balance, gift history, and gift‑related mutations, refreshing affected queries after updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, providing login, logout, and identity persistence through a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useMic.ts: Implements mic‑related queries and mutations, including mic holder, queue, audio clips, and request/accept/record actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useRooms.ts: Provides hooks to list rooms, fetch a room, and create new rooms, invalidating room lists on creation.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserDisplayName.ts: Fetches a user’s display name or fallback, caching results briefly for efficiency.
frontend/src/hooks/useZegoKitToken.ts: Generates and caches Zego live‑stream tokens for authenticated users, with backend feature checks and detailed error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying global base styles and defaults.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/CreateRoomPage.tsx: Provides a form for authenticated users to create a new live room with title and description.
frontend/src/pages/ExploreRoomsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays a list of live rooms with loading states, errors, and navigation to room details.
frontend/src/pages/RoomPage.tsx: Loads a specific room, shows stream, owner info, and related panels, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/UserProfilePage.tsx: Displays a user profile with avatar, follower counts, and follow button, handling loading and not-found cases.
frontend/src/types/zego-uikit-prebuilt.d: Declares TypeScript types for Zego UIKit global APIs and room join configuration.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, container settings, and plugins for styling the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines the project's current state, goals, architecture rules, and feature requirements for building a mobile live streaming app using ZEGOCLOUD and Firebase.
